local_intent: Perceive and confirm visibility, then approach and align to the Pepsi can within 0.01 m tolerance, verifying visibility after alignment. Retry detection if needed.
assumptions: Pepsi can is reachable from above for alignment
Line-scan is sufficient to relocate the can if not initially visible
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global plan: Scan/Detect -> ApproachAndAlign, without gripper, push, retreat, or wait steps. Uses same targets and tolerances.
